author: bewee
description: Use macros to create advanced rules
name: Macros

editor.title: Editor
editor.description: Which graphical editor do you want to use?

accessToken.title: Access token
accessToken.description: required in order to communicate with devices

scanInterval.title: Interval
scanInterval.description: in seconds; defines how often to scan for new devices

log_limit_time.title: Log limit (time)
log_limit_time.description: in seconds; defines the maximum amount of time that log entries are stored

log_limit_num.title: Log limit (number)
log_limit_num.description: defines the maximum number of log entries that are stored (for each macro)

macrolog2console.title: Add macro logs to log file
macrolog2console.description: Print macro's log entries to the global log file of the gateway as well

page_macros.title: Include macros page?
page_macros.description: Whether to include the extension page for managing macros

page_variables.title: Include variables page?
page_variables.description: Whether to include the extension page for managing variables

include.title: Include macros device?
include.description: Whether to add a device for managing macros

raw_property.title: Include raw macro property?
raw_property.description: Whether to add a property for the raw contents of each macro

execute_action.title: Include execute action?
execute_action.description: Whether to add an action for executing each macro

actions.title: Include macro actions?
actions.description: Whether to add various macro actions (add, remove, ...)

events.title: Include macro events?
events.description: Whether to add events for each macro

include.title: Include variables device?
include.description: Whether to add a device for managing variables

raw_property.title: Include raw variable property?
raw_property.description: Whether to add a property for the raw value of each variable

value_property.title: Include variable value property?
value_property.description: Whether to add a property for the value of each variable

type_property.title: Include variable type property?
type_property.description: Whether to add a property for the type of each variable

actions.title: Include variable actions?
actions.description: Whether to add various variable actions (add, remove, ...)

events.title: Include variable events?
events.description: Whether to add events for each variable
